briefTitle: A Study to Evaluate the Safety of STS101 in the Acute Treatment of Migraine
officialTitle: An Open-Label, 12-Month Study to Evaluate the Safety and Tolerability of STS101 (Dihydroergotamine Nasal Powder) in the Acute Treatment of Migraine
summary: Study STS101-003 is a multi-center, multiple dose (PRN), open-label, 12-month study to evaluate the safety and tolerability of STS101 (dihydroergotamine nasal powder) in the acute treatment of migraine.

primaryOutcome.measure: Percentage of Participants With Attacks With Sustained Freedom From Headache Pain 2-48 Hours (Modified Intent to Treat Population)
primaryOutcome.timeFrame: At Month 12 of Study Medication Dosing
